ygData.subject: RE: Questions about bards weapons?
ygData.msgSnippet: until i finally upgraded in the last couple weeks, from level 40 to 50 and for a long time after, i used the Crystalline Blade and Silvery War Axe Combo.
ygData.messageBody:
until i finally upgraded in the last couple weeks, from level 40 to 50 and
for a long time after, i used the Crystalline Blade and Silvery War Axe
Combo. gives you a nice high damage primary with a quick secondary. if you
want both really fast you can use the silvery war axe/dirk or get a bladed
thulian claws. the shard and staff are fun for the procs, but the staff is
not all that good a ratio compared to your other weps.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 21 High Elf Paladin
Tyria, Level 10 High Elf Wizard
Mithaniel Marr Server


> -----Original Message-----

> From: CMai <CMai@...>
>
> I am lvl 33 bard. I need advice on weapons.
>
> I have a
>
> writhing staff
> barbed whip
> black enamel Mace
> Dragoon Dirk
> Silver axe
>
> I am thinking of getting a crystalline blade and an obsidian shard.
>
> I was wondering which 2 weapons out of the 7 do you all think
> is best to
> use?
>
> Thank you,
> Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
> Hammerpaw and Samiam Syren Wind
> Champions of Norrath, The Rathe
>
